description: This Dart file defines the ScheduleProvider class, which manages schedule data for a kindergarten management system. It handles loading, adding, updating, and deleting schedules, maintains state including loading status and errors, and provides methods to retrieve schedules filtered by day or class.

classes.name: ScheduleProvider
classes.description: A provider class that manages schedule data, exposing methods for CRUD operations and state management, and notifying listeners on changes.

methods.name: loadSchedules
methods.description: Asynchronously loads schedules from the database.

methods.name: addSchedule
methods.description: Asynchronously adds a new schedule to the database and updates local state.

methods.name: updateSchedule
methods.description: Asynchronously updates an existing schedule in the database and local state.

methods.name: deleteSchedule
methods.description: Asynchronously deletes a schedule by ID from the database and updates local state.

methods.name: getSchedulesForDay
methods.description: Returns a sorted list of schedules for a specified day of the week.

methods.name: getSchedulesForClass
methods.description: Returns a list of schedules for a specified class.

methods.name: get uniqueClasses
methods.description: Returns a sorted list of unique class names.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Internal method to set loading state and notify listeners.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Clears the current error state and notifies listeners.
